suggest.spryker-shop/discount-widget: If you want to use components from module DiscountWidget or DiscountSummaryWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
suggest.spryker-shop/cart-page: The main page view is based on template from the cart page. Please redefine the template if you would like to use a custom behavior.
